scenario.name: invite_client
scenario.send: INVITE sip:alice@localhost:5059 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:alice@localhost>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:alice@localhost> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:alice@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 5 Expires: 1800 User-Agent: SIPp/Linux Content-Length: 0
